programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A flushed baby alligator survives on hormone-filled lab rats, grows giant, and unleashes chaos in Chicago.

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

programme.title: Creepshow 3
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow features five new tales of horror.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: Stepfather II
programme.desc: After escaping the insane asylum in which he was incarcerated, the Stepfather impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient and her young son.

programme.title: Stepfather III
programme.desc: A suspicious youth utilises his computer skills to learn the true identity of the menacing figure romancing his mother.

programme.title: Body Bags
programme.desc: A creepy-looking coroner (John Carpenter) introduces three different horror tales involving his current work which are cadavers in "body bags".

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: After a prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: Sorority House Massacre
programme.desc: College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: After a terrible boating accident killed her family, shy Angela Baker is sent to Camp Arawak where a series of bizarre and violent �accidents� occur.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.

programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.
